DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to investigate the safety and immunogenicity of Chiron's investigational H. pylori (HP3) vaccine
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of Chiron's Investigational H. Pylori Vaccine in Healthy Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy Ages 1840 Negative for H. pylori infection Contraception for females Present or past H. pylori infection Medically significant gastroduodenal disease Recent corticosteroid use Bleed diathesis Use of antibiotics used to treat H. pylori infection
